name: Taintless
description:
If you could go back to your memories and relive certain moments, would you do it?

In Taintless you take part in Joel's experience through a life changing perspective. Living his gray and day by day life an accident but he in front of some of his most disturbing memories which let him become what he is today.

Enjoy Taintless experience and let us know what you think about it.

Check out our facebook page for updates, screenshots and teasers:
Taintless Facebook!

Game still in Beta Phase
